name: BREAK
description: Statement, program jump out of the innermost enclosing loop

name: CONTINUE
description: Statement, skips upcoming statements in loop once

name: SWITCH CASE
description: Statement, Executes block of statements among many blocks

name: FLOAT
description: Keyword, declares single-precision floating type variable

name: DOUBLE
description: Keyword, declares double-precision floating type variable

name: IF-ELSE
ENUM
EXTERN
description: Keyword, declares var/func having linkage outside file

name: TYPEDEF
description: Keyord, associate a type with an identifier
example:
typedef float kg;
kg bear, tiger;

name: VOLATILE
description: Keyword, variable modified in an unspecified way
